WorkItem.Description:
You are not able to use a WYSIWYG editor with version 2.0 of the Club Starter Kit.
Any idea how a CSS reference and or theme reference could be added to fix this?
 
My web designers found this issue when I passed it to them with version 2.0 release.
Tested in Visual Web Developer & Expression Web.
 
This is a show stopper for my team and help would be much appreciated.
See the attached file for review.
WorkItem.Summary: You are not able to use a WYSIWYG editor with version 2.0

Comments.Message: WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT!!!!!!! WE HAVE FCKEDITOR!!!!!
